name: shuang
description: 帮助你快速上手双拼输入法

scripts.build-win: del /Q build\*.js && npx babel src -d build && ren .\build\*.js *.min.js && copy .\src\style.css .\build\style.min.css
scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && npx babel src -d build && for i in build/*.js;do mv "$i" "${i%.js}.min.js";done && cp ./src/style.css ./build/style.min.css

author: BlueSky
